籤詩版本二:
Yiba nesizotha futhi ube nesizotha lapho ungena futhi uphuma, thembeka futhi uthembeke lapho ukhuluma
Umqondo awucacile futhi usamile, ilanga elibomvu elikhanyayo liphakathi
詩意:
Le hexagram imele umfanekiso welanga elibomvu elikhanya esibhakabhakeni.
Konke kuhamba njengoba bekuhleliwe.
解曰: Akukho lutho engqondweni. Amanzi asekwindla acwebile. Asikho isidingo sokungabaza. Izinto zenzeka ngokwemvelo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Taoyuan ubuzalwane obufungelwe
Ekupheleni koMbuso WaseMpumalanga Han, umhlaba wawunesiphithiphithi, futhi amasela e-Yellow Turban ayedala isiphithiphithi yonke indawo.
U-Liu Bei, u-Guan Yu kanye no-Zhang Fei, abantu abathathu abanemibono ephakeme, babenemibono efanayo futhi bencike komunye nomunye ngamazwi nangezenzo zabo ukuze benze injongo enkulu ndawonye. Bakhethe inkathi lapho ukuqhakaza kwepentshisi kwase kuqhakaze ngokugcwele. , futhi benza umcimbi engadini yezimbali zamapentshisi (manje eyiDolobha laseSonglindian, eDolobheni laseZhuozhou, eSifundazweni SaseHebei) Baba abangane abafungiswa ngewayini, bafunga ezulwini, bahlanganyela ubunzima, bahlanganyela ubunzima, bahlanganyela izibusiso, futhi ngokubambisana babona ubuhle. ilungele ukuvuselela ubukhosi bakwaHan. Laba bobathathu baphenduka izelamani.KwakunguNdasa kanti izimbali zamapentshisi seziqhakazile, zaziwa ngokuthi "Abazalwane Abathathu Engadini Yamapentshisi".
聖意: Ukuvikeleka kwekhaya, ingcebo, ingcebo, ubunzima bokuthengiselana, umshado, ingozi, abahamba ngezinyawo bavimbe amasimu, izikelemu zesilika, imfuyo, abantu abalahlekile, amacala, ukulahlekelwa, ukufuduka, ukugcina, ukulahleka kwempahla, ukugula, ukubeka, ukuthumela ethuneni entabeni, inhlanhla
